Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUIView

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUIView.GameView
public class GameView extends Object
The GameView class represents the view for the game screen.

    • GameView

      public GameView(ScreenSwitcher screenSwitcher)
      Constructs a GameView object.

  • Method Details

    • createContent

      public javafx.scene.layout.HBox createContent(List<String> players, CommonGoals commonGoals, HashMap<String,PersonalGoal> personalGoals, BoardCard[][] livingRoom, Boolean[][] selectables, ArrayList<Pair<String,BoardCard[][]>> playersShelves, HashMap<String,Integer> playersPoints, GameStateType gameState)
      Creates the content for the game view.
      Parameters:
      players - The list of players.
      commonGoals - The common goals.
      personalGoals - The personal goals.
      livingRoom - The living room grid.
      selectables - The selectable positions in the living room.
      playersShelves - The players' shelves.
      playersPoints - The points of each player.
      gameState - The current game state.
      Returns:
      The root HBox containing the game view.

    • setPlayingPlayer

      public void setPlayingPlayer(String playingPlayer)
      Sets the currently playing player. Updates the playing player property. If the playing player is the current client user, displays an information alert indicating that it's their turn.
      Parameters:
      playingPlayer - The nickname of the playing player.

    • setChairedPlayer

      public void setChairedPlayer(String chairedPlayer)
      Sets the currently chaired player. Updates the chaired player property.
      Parameters:
      chairedPlayer - The nickname of the chaired player.

    • setGameState

      public void setGameState(String gameState)
      Sets the current game state. Updates the game state property.
      Parameters:
      gameState - The current game state.

    • updateChatMessages

      public void updateChatMessages(ArrayList<Pair<String,Pair<String,String>>> chatMessages)

    • orderSelected

      public void orderSelected()
      Handles the ordering of selected cards. If there are multiple selected cards, displays an interface for ordering them. If there is only one selected card, proceeds to setting up the column buttons.

    • setColumn

      public void setColumn()
      Sets up the column buttons for the player's grid. Calculates the dimensions of each button based on the player's grid size. Adds a button for each column in the grid. Handles the button click event to perform actions based on the selected column.

    • setLivingRoom

      public void setLivingRoom(BoardCard[][] livingRoom)
      Sets the living room grid with the specified board cards.
      Parameters:
      livingRoom - The array of board cards representing the living room.

    • setShelf

      public void setShelf(Pair<String,BoardCard[][]> updatedPlayerShelf)
      Sets the shelf for a player and updates the corresponding UI elements.
      Parameters:
      updatedPlayerShelf - The pair containing the player name and the updated player shelf.

    • setSelectables

      public void setSelectables(Boolean[][] selectables)
      Sets the selectables matrix that represents the selectable state of items.
      Parameters:
      selectables - The Boolean matrix indicating the selectable state of items.

    • setUpdatedPlayerPoints

      public void setUpdatedPlayerPoints(Pair<String,Integer> updatedPlayerPoints)
      Updates the points for a specific player and refreshes the corresponding UI element.
      Parameters:
      updatedPlayerPoints - The pair containing the player name and updated points.

    • setFinalScoreBoard

      public void setFinalScoreBoard(ArrayList<Pair<String,Integer>> finalScoreBoard)
      Sets the final scoreboard and displays it in a separate stage. The scoreboard is sorted in descending order based on the players' scores.
      Parameters:
      finalScoreBoard - The list of pairs containing player names and scores.

    • disableAllButtons

      public void disableAllButtons()
      Disables all buttons in the living room. This method is executed on the JavaFX application thread using `Platform.runLater()`. It iterates over each row of buttons in the living room and disables each button.
